comments:
Driver:  RC1 (1201_0337)

When creating a Web service(top-down or bottom-up), if the user also choose to generate proxy, the user cannot get to the client page (after the Test with Web Services Explorer).

The error in the console is:

Joan, here's the bug for the scenario we were just investigating with Kathy and Peter.

Created an attachment (id=30956)
apply to org.eclipse.jst.ws.consumption.ui

Created an attachment (id=30957)
apply to org.eclipse.jst.ws.creation.ui

The patches contain mappings that were missing from the ServerWidgetBinding for the combined scenario.
Changes reviewed and committed. Kathy, please test the patch. Will release pending a decision to respin RC1.
I've tested the patch and with these fixes, all the Web services smoke tests ran succesfully.  The only problem is having to manually select install client (bug 118830).
